text: (innilaiyil avarkal narakattin atipatiyai nokki) ‘‘malikke! Umatu iraivan enkal kariyattai mutittu vitattum. (Maranattin mulamayinum enkalukku vitutalai kitaikkattum)'' enru captamituvarkal. Atarkavar ‘‘(mutiyatu!) Niccayamaka ninkal ite nilaimaiyil (vetanaiyai anupavittuk konte maranikkatu) irukka ventiyatutan'' enru kuruvar
